purpose: The email invites submissions for three workshops co-located with the 26th International Conference on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement (PROFES 2025) in Salerno, Italy, on December 1, 2025. The workshops focus on quality evaluation of machine learning software systems, advanced technology in healthcare, and analytics for software product and process improvement. Important dates for submissions and guidelines for paper formats are provided.
evidence_sentences: We are pleased to invite submissions to the following three workshops, co-located with the 26th International Conference on Product-Focused Software Process Improvement (PROFES 2025), to be held in Salerno, Italy, on December 1, 2025.

These workshops provide forums for researchers, practitioners, and policymakers to present and discuss recent advancements and challenges in software engineering and its intersection with machine learning, healthcare technologies, and software analytics.
